Traits.Name: Distorted Soul
Traits.Description:
• When not bloodied, gain resistance to all physical damage and gain flying. All magical damage against this demon is godly.
• When bloodied, gain resistance to all magic damage and gain Absorb Aether. All physical damage against this demon is godly.
• Absorb Aether (1/round): Gain 1 vigor when a magic ability is used in range 3.

Traits.Name: Distort Space
Traits.Description: All Natals in range 3 are intangible (they cannot be devoured while intangible).
